name: C19HCCSuspectedCOVID19InfectionSNOMEDCT
title: C19HCC Suspected COVID19 Infection SNOMEDCT
purpose: (Clinical Focus: Conditions indicative of a possible COVID-19 infection but no definitive COVID-19 diagnosis.),(Data Element Scope: Used to identify patients suspected to have COVID-19.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes conditions indicative of a possible COVID-19 diagnosis.),(Exclusion Criteria: Conditions associated with a confirmed COVID-19 infection.)
